channel.title: [PI] partyhat drop rate plz read and help if you can[PI]
channel.description:
[code]hello guys s on my server i added corp beast and it drops partyhats but the problem is that it almost drop phats every time! heres my config.tsm [code=]#Corporeal Beast 8133:1 533:100 1265:50 1620:1 1622:1 1624:1 995:450 1038:1 1040:1 1042:1 1044:1 1046:1 1048:1[/code]
as you can see the rare item drop rate is 1% but they drop almost everytime

item.title: [PI] partyhat drop rate plz read and help if you can[PI]
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:2, topic:434178”]Make it higher, 1 means like it drops almost everytime 100 means very very hard

make it 70 or something :)[/quote]
ooh thank you

Read full topic
